info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:03PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Union County through 245 PM EDT... At 203 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Monroe, or near Lake Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Indian Trail, Weddington, Stallings, Unionville, Wesley Chapel, Wingate, Lake Park, Mineral Springs and Hemby Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
